```{r setup, eval = TRUE}
library(dplyr)
library(purrr)
library(tibble)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
restim <- readRDS("data/stanfits/Liberia_rsamples_343_49.rds")
rsamples <- select(restim, - (date:var))
rsamples <- as.matrix(rsamples)
r_qntls <- apply(rsamples, 1, quantile, probs = c(0.025, 0.5, 0.975))
```
